# Abstract 

Here, we examine the cool life expectancy plot. In-class Lab day 1. 


#Life Expectancy Analysis 
```{r}

install.packages("gapminder")
library(gapminder)
library(dplyr)
gm_unf <- gapminder_unfiltered

head(gm_unf)

group_by() summarize()

?group_by
?summarise
?semi_join
by_life_exp <- gm_unf %>% group_by(year) %>% filter(lifeExp == max(lifeExp)) %>% select(country, lifeExp, year) %>% arrange(year)

head(by_life_exp)


by_life_exp


plot(by_life_exp)

```
